document.full_text: ford motor co was the top automaker in 2010 as measured by u.s. customer loyalty, overtaking general motors co, the 2009 leader, market consultancy polk said on thursday.
document.title: ford tops in auto customer loyalty: polk
lines_and_colors: ford motor co was the top automaker in 2010 as measured by u.s. customer loyalty, overtaking general motors co, the 2009 leader, market consultancy polk said on thursday.
